article.title: Hesterman Appointed to OUSD (P&R) Post
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: Maj. Gen. John W. Hesterman III, USAF, has been nominated for appointment to the grade of lieutenant general and assignment as military deputy for readiness to the undersecretary of defense (personnel and readiness), Office of the Secretary of Defense, Pentagon, Washington, D.C.
